src_original: athaiṣāṃ daśānāmanuśayānāṃ kathaṃ pravṛttiriti / [304/13-304/14]  ādita eva tāvadavidyāyyogātsatyeṣu sa muhyati / [304/14]
mohākāṅkṣā [304/16]  mūḍhasya pakṣadvayaṃ śrutvā vicikitsotpadyate /  duḥkhaṃ nvidaṃ natvidaṃ duḥkhamityevamādi / [304/17]
tato mithyādṛṣṭiḥ [304/18]  vicikitsāyā mithyādṛṣṭiḥ pravartate / [304/18-304/19]  saṃśayitasya mithyāśramaṇacittānāṃ mithyāniścayotpatteḥ / [304/19]  nāsti duḥkhamityevmādi / [304/20]
satkāyadṛktataḥ // VAkK_5.32 // [304/21]  mithyādṛṣṭeḥ kila satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ pravartate /
tato 'ntagrahaṇaṃ [305/01]  satkāyadṛṣṭerantagrāhadṛṣṭiḥ pravartate /  ātmanaḥ śāśvatocchedāntagrahaṇāt / [305/02]  tasmācchhīlāmarśaḥ [305/03]  antagrahācchīlavrataparāmarśaḥ / [305/03-305/04]
